Folder: CountryTrivia Title: Q1 Category: Subject/CountryTrivia 1) Which state starts with the letter U?
~ Utah starts with the letter U. This was an easy one.
*a) Utah
b) Kansas
c) Washington
d) Vermont

Type: F Folder: CountryTrivia Title: Q2 Category: Subject/CountryTrivia 2) What's the largest state in the US?
~ Alaska is the largest state in the US. It has a square footage of 663,267 to 665,384 square miles
a) Alaska

Type: E Folder: CountryTrivia Title: Q3 Category: Subject/CountryTrivia 3) Discuss the pros and cons of living in different states.

Folder: CountryTrivia Title: Q4 Category: Subject/CountryTrivia 4) Which of the following are considered southern states?
~ Mississippi and South Carolina are both considered southern states.
*a) Mississippi
*b) South Carolina
c) North Carolina
d) Virginia
